title: Information and Digital Literacy Skill Development Program for Visually Impaired Individuals (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with Digital Device Usage and Foundational Knowledge in Specialized Fields (Medical/Legal/Technical)
context.additional_context: Accessibility-optimized environment for visually impaired learners, utilizing open educational resources.

learning_goals: Independently navigate 80% or more of digital content using screen-reading software.
Convert and utilize professional field information (medical/legal/technical) into three or more formats using assistive technology.
Explain the process of reusing and sharing open-licensed (CC BY-SA) educational materials
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
